Uses of Audio in com.radirius.mercury.audio
 

Methods in com.radirius.mercury.audio that return Audio
static Audio Audio.getAudio(java.io.InputStream is, java.lang.String format)
          Makes a source based off of buffer, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.
static Audio Audio.getAudio(java.nio.IntBuffer buffer)
          Makes a source based off of buffer, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.
 Audio Audio.pause()
          Pauses the clip.
 Audio Audio.play()
          Plays the clip.
 Audio Audio.setLooping(boolean loop)
          Sets whether or not the clip should loop.
 Audio Audio.setPitch(float pit)
          Sets the pitch of the clip.
 Audio Audio.setVolume(float vol)
          Sets the volume of the clip.
 Audio Audio.stop()
          Stops the clip.
 Audio Audio.togglePause()
          Plays the clip if it is paused, pauses it if it is not paused.
 Audio Audio.toggleStop()
          Plays the clip if it is stopped, stops it if it is not stopped.
